member.name: T:ArtikujtService.Results.ServiceError
member.summary: Encapsulates an error from the Services.

member.name: P:ArtikujtService.Results.ServiceError.Code
member.summary: Gets or sets the code for this error.

member.name: P:ArtikujtService.Results.ServiceError.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the description for this error.

member.name: P:ArtikujtService.Results.ServiceResult.Succeeded
member.summary: Flag indicating whether if the operation succeeded or not.
member.value: True if the operation succeeded, otherwise false.

member.name: P:ArtikujtService.Results.ServiceResult.Errors
member.summary: An of s containing an errors that occurred during the service operation.

member.name: P:ArtikujtService.Results.ServiceResult.Success
member.summary: Returns an indicating a successful service operation.

member.name: M:ArtikujtService.Results.ServiceResult.Failed(ArtikujtService.Results.ServiceError[])
member.summary: Creates an indicating a failed service operation, with a list of if applicable.
member.param: An optional array of s which caused the operation to fail.
member.returns: An indicating a failed service operation, with a list of if applicable.

member.name: M:ArtikujtService.Results.ServiceResult.ToString
member.summary: Converts the value of the current object to its equivalent string representation.
member.returns: A string representation of the current object.
member.remarks: If the operation was successful the ToString() will return "Succeeded" otherwise it returned "Failed : " followed by a comma delimited list of error codes from its collection, if any.
